AREA VIII
PHYSICAL PLANT
AND FACILITIES

S.1. The institution has a student center
with supplies and materials.
The student Center has adequate supplies and materials if needed.

The Chairman of Barangay Bagtas had given a
certification that allows CvSU- Tanza Campus
to use the covered Ph. 2, bahay Katuparan,
Bagtas Tanza Cavite and Bagtas Magkaisa
Park for their physical education and other
school - related activities. The said recreational
area is located near campus.

The institution has a student area to accomodate
the needs of acacdemic community.
